results.title: X-box binding protein 1: A new metabolic mediator and drug target of metformin?
results.text_hl: Our preliminary results demonstrate that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ activates @GENE_PRKAA1 @GENE_5562 @@@AMPK@@@ to reduce @CHEMICAL_Triglycerides @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014280 @@@TG@@@ synthesis by inhibiting the @GENE_XBP1 @GENE_7494 @@@XBP1@@@-mediated @GENE_DGAT2 @GENE_84649 @@@DGAT2@@@ pathway, at least in part, suggesting that @GENE_XBP1 @GENE_7494 @@@XBP1@@@ is a new metabolic mediator for @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment of @DISEASE_Hypertriglyceridemia @DISEASE_MESH:D015228 @@@hypertriglyceridemia@@@ and associated @<m>DISEASE_Metabolic_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008659 @@@metabolic disease@@@.
